title: Bug 134488 - Setting page break for a table inside a list group header causes data display error.
description: Issue reported regarding data display error when setting page break for a table inside a list group header.
OB: When the page break is set for a table inside a list group header, the data display is erroneous.
EB: The data display should not be affected when setting a page break for a table inside a list group header.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a list with a group.
2. Insert a table into the list group header.
3. Set 'page-break-before' to 'always' for the table.
4. Preview the content in a web viewer/HTML/PDF.
